original_text: For the bodies of those beasts, whose blood is brought into the sanctuary by the high priest for sin, are burned without the camp.
korean_text: 이는 죄를 위한 짐승의 피는 대제사장이 가지고 성소에 들어가고 그 육체는 영문 밖에서 불사름이라

sentences.original_text: For the bodies of those beasts
whose blood is brought into sanctuary
by the high priest for sin
